subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Roy Hibbert scored 24 points and Danny Granger had 17 of his 20 in the second half as Indiana opened a two-game lead over Charlotte and Milwaukee for the last playoff position.
snippet: Roy Hibbert scored 24 points and Danny Granger had 17 of his 20 in the second half as Indiana opened a two-game lead over Charlotte and Milwaukee for the last playoff position.
